root.name: Just Dance 3
root.description: OverviewJust Dance 3 is a dance game by Ubisoft. In it, up to four players mirror the motions of a silhouetted FMV character in the center of the screen, with stickfigure prompts in the bottom-right corner. This is accomplished with the aid of one Wii Remote or Playstation Move controller in each player's right hand on non-Kinect platforms.Counter to previous installments (which were only available on the Nintendo Wii), Just Dance 3 is the first game in the Just Dance franchise to also release on Playstation 3 and Xbox 360 (due to Move and Kinect support, respectively).FeaturesFully animated stage-specific backgrounds. The dancer on Black Eyed Peas - "Pump It" causes crystals to shoot up out of the ground in time with the music, which shatter and fall to the floor.Specific songs have 4-part choreographies. "I Was Made For Lovin' You" has each player miming out a part in a four-person band.Dance Mashup mode, which combines moves and routines from several songs into one, providing a unique experience every time.An enhanced Just Sweat mode, featuring more workout plans.Returning modes include Classic Mode, Duet Mode, Medley, and Simon Says.Just Create mode, in which players on the Xbox 360 can film their own routines with the Kinect camera and upload them via a user-generated content interface, allowing friends to dance along and try to match the routine.The Kinect version is the first Kinect dance game to support 4 players dancing at once.Song LIstOver 45 songs are confirmed for release on-disc, spanning new genres for the Just Dance series (including Bollywood and Reggaeton).
